text: Prateep Polphantin (born 16 July 1926) is a Thai former sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics and 1962 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Thai male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Thailand Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bangkok Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Thailand Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Prateep Polphantin
